link_desc:
Zagile (from Zabbix AGILE) is a dashboard built on top of Zabbix API. It’s a responsive web application for desktop (primary) and mobile browsers.

Thanks to its SPA (Single Page Application) web architecture provides fluid user experience akin to a desktop application thanks to browser's cached data through user page navigation.

With pass-trough login system all Zabbix users can login on Zagile and you can use the same ACL defined to Zabbix. No Zabbix credentials are store on Zagile backend.

Zagile is a strengths not only for classic Zabbix users but also for TELCO companies that using Zabbix for theirs customers.
Companies can create a Zagile business account, register one or more customers (with its logo and Zabbix API endpoint url) and then deliver a fast, simple and responsive infrastructure data to them.

You can see features overview and try a live demo (no registration is required) at http://www.zagile.online

Zagile is a SAAS services for Zabbix end users and MSP/TELCO companies.
author: Ricca Srl
